Although this was not directly associated with a test failure, it did cause some
of the subsequent ThemeAPITests and a couple of other tests to fail, either
because the workbench was not in the expected state (intro still up), or because
a theme change hit the disposed image again.

Is this still a problem in 3.3?

PW
